directions.text: Dice the carrots, onion, and garlic.
In a pot at medium low heat add oil, garlic, and onions cook for 5 mins.
Add salt, pepper, curry paste, chopped carrots, and chicken broth.
Bring to a boil, then reduce to a medium low heat and cook for 25 mins.
Remove from the heat and add coconut milk and cool to room temperature.
Puree the mixture in a pitcher until smooth.
